amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to strike funding for Food for Peace Title II Grants and directs the total to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Food for Peace Title II Grants by $1,740,000,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 348 (Roll no. 414).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 348 (Roll no. 414).
